channel.title: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?
channel.description: I've seen a tutorial of it but it look harder than it should. Is there something I need to add into NPChandler or something? ThankYou

item.title: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

no problem =]

did it work?

item.title: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @HelpMePloxed HelpMePloxed
item.description:
@HelpMePloxed wrote:

Lol Whatever

[quote=“woofdawg23, post:7, topic:169308”][quote author=HelpMePloxed link=topic=229004.msg1965342#msg1965342 date=1199088975]
The Question Is “HOW” Do I Make NPC’s Talk.

npchandler.java

[/quote]and i told u how. go2 npchandler.java thats one of the steps required which is basically HOW u do it.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 09:23:26 PM[/size][hr]Thanks Alot For This, Really Appreciated!

[quote=“kiwon, post:6, topic:169308”]go to npchandler.java

press ctrl + f and find

moo

under the last } add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What you want it to say"; } }

change the NPCID and What you want it to say…

pretty straight forward =][/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?

item.title: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“HelpMePloxed, post:5, topic:169308”]The Question Is “HOW” Do I Make NPC’s Talk.

[quote author=woofdawg23 link=topic=229004.msg1965340#msg1965340 date=1199088936]
npchandler.java
[/quote][/quote]and i told u how. go2 npchandler.java thats one of the steps required which is basically HOW u do it.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?

item.title: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

go to npchandler.java

press ctrl + f and find

moo

under the last } add

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What you want it to say"; } }

change the NPCID and What you want it to say…

pretty straight forward =]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make NPC's Talk?
